title: 2018 Yt Tues Pro Race Carbon - XL
text: Selling my 2018 Yt Tues Carbon in XL frame size. (Sized closer to a Large)I bought this bike in April of 2021 and it was still BRAND NEW and UNOPENED from the factory in its original box and disassembled. Everything on the bike is carbon. The frame, swingarm, wheels, handlebars, cranks, derailleur, shifter even the seatpost. The bike weighs about 15.4kgs without pedals.I had about 10-12 occasions of bike park riding on it at Highland Bike Park in New Hampshire, USA. Also 1 day at Hellsend, Stellenbosch, and that's it. The bike still has its OEM signature tyres on as 'proof' of the mileage(or lack thereof)This puppy also has had a full service done by TheBikePark in Constantia Uitsig and both fork and shock has been serviced by Omnico (still have the receipts). It has not been ridden since.Included are some extras:E*thirteen valves for tubeless setupFactory ODI AG signature gripsExtra E*thirteen crank shoesODI race number boardCrank Bros. Stamp 7 pedals(with spare pins)AM Camo frame protection on top tube, shock pivot and swingarmand the owners manuals.Also have a bunch of gear to sell separately(too much to mention) I'm 184cm and just about 80kg.Price is firm, I'm in no rush to sell, I'm just doing it a great disservice by not letting it shred as it was meant to.Cheers, Marten

title: 2022 SCOTT ASPECT 970 29ER MTB

title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. title: Children's Cycling Club
text: PINNACLE CYCLING is a cycling group for children that runs for 4 Saturdays a month. Our rides take place in the afternoons so as not to clash with school sport, however does move earlier in the holidays. Our group rides take place at common mountain biking routes such as Bisley Park, Mountain View, Hilton forests, Cascades Mountain bike park and Alex Track. We focus on outrides to build indurance as well as interval based training to build strength for the longer rides.We like to also swap some Saturdays from a ride to a hike which we found builds better team dynamics and adds to the childrens overall fitness.Pinnacle Cycling is Club with a monthly fee of R400-00 per child with a once off joining fee of R150-00 per child. The monthly fee is always paid up in advance on the 25th of every month, no later than the 26th.Upon joining, each child is required to complete 3 forms:Registration FormPayment FormPhoto Consent FormThese forms will be sent to you and need to be completed and the hard copy given at the first session.Each rider is required to have:- A Mountain bike with front shocks (not a BMX bike)- Closed shoes (Takkies or cleats)- Tube repair kit- Spare bike tube- Sunglasses for eye protection- SABS approved Helmet (No Helmet, No Ride, No Exceptions)Pinnacle Cycling also holds holiday events that are charged separately. This is where we focus a lot on team building, activities and some more on fitness and skills.

title: Rockrider 20" Red Mountain Bike for Sale
text:
Rockrider Mountain Bike 20" in excellent condition- as new. Only used a few times. Price new is R6599 

This mountain bike is designed for children who are aged 6 to 9 and looking for adventure. It's suitable for kids with heights between 120 and 135 cm.

For comfortable rides on rough terrain, we've equipped this 20" MTB with a suspension fork. Easily overcome slopes with the 6 speeds.
Our engineers have designed a new aluminium frame. Durable, lightweight and responsive: designed for tackling any obstacles when out mountain biking.

Effective braking thanks to the cable-activated disc brake at the front and a V-brake at the rear.
The disc brake acts on the wheel axle to deliver powerful braking under any conditions (dry, wet, muddy, etc.).

The V-brake is composed of 2 levers equipped with pads that exercise more or less pressure on the rim to slow or stop the rotation of the wheels.

Take on new challenging terrain (roots, stones, gravel, etc.) with ease thanks to the travel of the front suspension fork.

This bike is equipped with a grip shifter to change between the 6 speeds: an easier, safer system as the child's hands stay on the handlebars.

This makes changing gears to match the terrain simple and easy!

Because children have smaller hands than adults, it's not always easy for them to reach the brake lever. This is why our engineers designed a brake lever that is closer to the handlebars and thus easier to hold.

A saddle with a sporty design, designed with care to adapt to the morphology of children. Combined with an aluminium seat post (sturdy and flexible) for even greater comfort.

We equipped this mountain bike with a short aluminium stem (60 mm handlebar) and an oversized 520 mm handle for more controlled steering. This makes you more precise and responsive on turns.

The new aluminium chainset has a 140 mm crank that is designed for a child's leg length. This light chainset allows you to start pedalling more easily.
The double chain guard prevents the chain from derailing.

The tyres are designed for mountain biking. The lateral lugs provide good grip on turns. The tyres use SkinWall technology. This process reduces their weight and makes them more flexible, which increases performance, grip and comfort.

The recommended tyre pressure is displayed on the tyre sidewall (between 2 and 3.5 bar).

20-inch 1.7"-2.2" wide inner tube with Schrader valve.

This MTB is equipped with a bell, lighting, wheel reflectors and platform pedals.

text: Contact Louis 0640659433 for orders or any further inquiries regarding our products (Call or Whatsapp).This new platform bicycle carrier has at last arrived, the rack is presently available in a 2 & 4 bike configuration, great features are the roomy wheel supports that hug the bikes tyres that are kept secure with ratchet straps, but the greatest advantage that the new rack has over most other platform type racks is the distance between the bike runner positions. No more clashing of handlebars, seats etc. The inverted U support frame is a good size so supporting 29ers in the upright position is not a problem.Features:* Stable and convenient bike carrier for 50mm tow-bar/tow-ball mounting* NO Spanner required to mount or dismount the bike carrier* The bike carrier tilts back, giving trunk access without off-loading the bikes* Folds flat for easy storage* Lockable to tow-bar* Adjustable wheel holders with soft straps for accommodating most types of bikes* Suitable for carbon frame bikes with holder attached to the seat post* Vertical frame folds flat for easy storage, compact enough to be kept in the trunk of the car* Standard big round 7-pin power plug for the light board* Carries up to 4 bikes, 60kg load capacity* 1 Year factory warranty* CE certified* Original and patented design* Weight: 15kg* Dimensions: 110cm x 77cm x 18cmSKU: 14969

title: Giant Trance X Advanced E + 1  for sale
text:
Giant Trance X Advanced E+1 or sale.  Bike was bought in March of this year, so is till under guarantee.  This is the link to the bike:
https://www.giant-bicycles.com/za/trance-x-advanced-eplus-1The bike has a full carbon frame and is stock other than the following additions:SRAM AXS 1x12 shifting.  This was moved across from my previous bike.Front chainring is 34 toothRaceface Carbon bars cut to 780mm widthBrooks B17 carved short saddle.https://www.brooksengland.com/en_row/b17-carved-short.htmlIncluded in the sale is the Giant EnergyPak PLUS 240Wh battery.  The battery simply clips onto the bike frame and plugs into the bike charging port.  I have added Gorilla Tape to the cable for extra protection.  I have also modified the water bottle holder plate to take two CO2 bombs.Front tyre is the Vitorria MAZZA 29x2.6 with the trail casingRear tyre is the Maxxis Disector 3C EXO +, MaxTerra 29x2.6Both tyres are in good condition.The Fox Live fork and shock run off the bike battery so no separate batteries required.The bike has done 1169km and has had 13 charges.

title: 2018 Yt Tues Pro Race Carbon - XL
text: Selling my 2018 Yt Tues Carbon in XL frame size. (Sized closer to a Large)I bought this bike in April of 2021 and it was still BRAND NEW and UNOPENED from the factory in its original box and disassembled. Everything on the bike is carbon. The frame, swingarm, wheels, handlebars, cranks, derailleur, shifter even the seatpost. The bike weighs about 15.4kgs without pedals.I had about 10-12 occasions of bike park riding on it at Highland Bike Park in New Hampshire, USA. Also 1 day at Hellsend, Stellenbosch, and that's it. The bike still has its OEM signature tyres on as 'proof' of the mileage(or lack thereof)This puppy also has had a full service done by TheBikePark in Constantia Uitsig and both fork and shock has been serviced by Omnico (still have the receipts). It has not been ridden since.Included are some extras:E*thirteen valves for tubeless setupFactory ODI AG signature gripsExtra E*thirteen crank shoesODI race number boardCrank Bros. Stamp 7 pedals(with spare pins)AM Camo frame protection on top tube, shock pivot and swingarmand the owners manuals.Also have a bunch of gear to sell separately(too much to mention) I'm 184cm and just about 80kg.Price is firm, I'm in no rush to sell, I'm just doing it a great disservice by not letting it shred as it was meant to.Cheers, Marten

title: ADO A20F XE Fat Tire E-bike - 250W Foldable
text:
ADO 20F XE electric bike is designed for customers with 3 different riding modes, and with Shimano 7-speed shifting system - The latest XE model
Shimano 7-speed TransmissionADO 20F XE  electric bike is designed for customers with 3 different riding modes, and with Shimano 7-speed shifting system, it can effectively solve the problems customers encounter on hills, snow and other difficult roads. Give customers a smooth sporting experience!
Front fork suspension to overcome rough and bumpy road conditions The front fork is with spring absorber ,which effectively absorbs the ground impact and brings sensitive response and smooth operation to the rider.
20X4.0 Fat TyreFolding electric bike looks much like any other foldable mountain bike, but with some extra style and those 20×4.0 CST fat tires have an attitude.
It combines the best of both foldable bikes and mountain bikes you can get.
Overall size : 1740*530*1200 mm
After folding: 980*450*770 mm
Net Weight: 30kgG-Driver 2.0 Control SystemADO’s updated G-Driver controller is the solution to gear automation. It offers excellent real-time performance and responds seamlessly to user input.


250w Powerful MotorThis 20-inch fat-tire electric bike packs some awesome power in the form of a massive 250-watt rear hub motor that works with a 36V 10.4Ah battery for a maximum speed of 25 miles per hour. The high-speed motor allows you to cross any terrain with ease.
location: Buh rein, Northern Suburbs, Western Cape

title: Raleigh M650 Dual Suspension 18-Speed Mountain Bike
text: Kindly read the entire description and view all the pictures before making contact. Swipe from one picture to the next, tap on picture for full view and pinch-zoom for greater detail.Unit pictured is the exact one that you're getting. Nothing more, nothing less. If it's not in the pictures, it's not there.Take your time to check through the pictures. I've tried to represent the product as honestly and completely as possible. I do my best to be your eyes when taking the pictures.Item used and will need some TLC to get mobile, but if you're handy with these things it shouldn't cost you too much before you're heading for the hills.Don't buy if you don't know what it is or can do! I can't offer you technical backup; you buy as-is.Why not make me an offer on it? You may well be better off for it? Collection from Alberton ONLY! (Couriers welcome too, but only after your funds have cleared).We chat on this platform only, so don't ask for WhatsApp/Wharrawharra. It'll prevent me from confusing you with somebody else and is also the recommended thing to do, for both your safety and mine. I've got the App on my cell phone, so will not be too far away to reply to you.

Tapered head tube 1 1/8” to 1.5” for increased front end stiffness aids steering accuracy.
